pr_title: [JBPM-9323] Some form options can't be rendered in API response / MultipleSelector

timeline.author: afalhambra
afalhambra

timeline.body:
can be replaced with method reference
```suggestion
                                    item.setOptions(field.getListOfValues().stream().map(ItemOption::new).collect(toList()));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
can be replaced with method reference

Suggested change
item.setOptions(field.getListOfValues().stream().map(e -> new ItemOption(e)).collect(toList()));
item.setOptions(field.getListOfValues().stream().map(ItemOption::new).collect(toList()));
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyHTML:
last condition type.contains("Date") is already tested in previous else-if statement.
Please remove
